application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Erection of a front roof extension with two front roof windows, a single storey rear extension with four solar panels on roof, enlargement of the existing basement with front and rear light wells, installation of front boundary gate, installation of four solar panels to the rear roof, following the demolition of the existing single storey rear extension and rear chimney
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [insert plan numbers/documents].

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.

Condition : 5 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.
Condition : 6 - The basement hereby permitted shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation.
